name: Roomshare
description:
This game was our submission for the Global Game Jam 2020. The theme was repair.

In this local multiplayer game you need to fix your accomodation before the landlord arrives.

Run, repair, throw the needed tool accros the whole flat to win time but take care: you don't want to miss an important call or get hit by a flying hammer... Moreover, one of you is a traitor and it's only purpose is to prevent you to repair the brokent stuff ! You better be quick if you want your bond back !

This game is for 4 players only.  Better with controlers.

Developpers: Mathis Pillonel, Dorian Doan, Matteo Brandi, Thomas Guitton

Sound designer: Thomas Guitton

3D artist: Remi Van Der Lee

Effects: Mathis Pillonel
